website_summaries.verdict: Environmentally safe model with a comfortable feel. One mat will trap most litter, but two mats minimizes tracking.
pros: Does not contain phthalate, a known carcinogen
cons: Litter stays trapped in fibers, not easy to clean
Needs to be aired out before use
Small dimensions, limited amount of litter captured

customer_reviews.title: Nice, big litter mat
customer_reviews.text: I bought two litter mats because they're Great! Light, yet strong and well made. The grey color keeps litter from even showing up and it's big enough to keep the entire area litter free because of the way the mat traps the litter in the clever looped weave of the mat.
customer_reviews.author: LN

customer_reviews.title: Not so good for larger pellet litter
customer_reviews.text: I use a pellet type of litter. Okocat for longhair cats. It is great and does not stick on their furry bottoms. However, it gets tracked out of the litter boxes and I have to vacuum all the time. I thought these mats might help, but even though they seem to be great for sand litter, they make no difference for pellet litter.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Radasky

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: Have not stepped on cat litter once since we put the mat down. My cats are not weirded out by it. It looks really nice in my bathroom! Great size and really catches all the litter. What a life saver
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Too good to be true
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product. So much that I even got a second one. I have an older cat than that needs a low entry litter box and sometimes gets too close to the opening, causing some to go out the opening. Being that this is waterproof I thought it would be perfect to help catch the litter as well as protect my wood floors. Instead it holds every ounce of Odor possible. vinegar and baking soda did nothing (which even gets the smell off my wooden floors) even soaked this thing in bleach-still stinks. Now I'm not just out one of these, but two.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great little mat!
customer_reviews.text: My little guy had a habit of tracking litter out of his box onto the floor around our laundry room. This mat is the perfect size to fit right where we needed it and it traps all the loose litter exactly as I'd hoped! No more litter all over the floors and no more surprises walking through the house. Game changer!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Gottuso

customer_reviews.title: Cannot get urine smell out
customer_reviews.text: A lot of the litter stuck in the mat and neither vacuuming nor shaking could get it all out. Then, when my sick cat became incontinent on the mat, I was unable to get the urine smell out. I tried soaking in the bathtub in a vinegar solution and scrubbing with various cleaning agents. Did not work. I ordered some urine remover, and when that gets here, if it solve the problem, I will edit this review, but meantime, it's more trouble than benefit.
customer_reviews.author: C. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Smells absolutely awful of chemicals.
customer_reviews.text: The smell of the mat out of the packaging is truly horrendous. We attempted to put the mat in a very large room and seconds of the mat being in the room filled the room with an awful chemical plastic smell and had to be removed immediately. It's a shame because the size and price is great and we need something as soon as possible for a rescue kitten. It will not be this mat!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nonononame

customer_reviews.title: This Litter Mat Works
customer_reviews.text: We use crystal litter and it rolled around on the floor and spread everywhere. This mat catches the pieces and has significantly reduced the spread of the litter and it's very easy to just vacuum the mat. Fuzzy likes it too!
customer_reviews.author: JJ Fountain Inn, SC

customer_reviews.title: No more messy floors!!❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: I like this mat so much that I bought two more. They are under two litter boxes and the food and water bowls. No more tracked litter, and if they spill the water bowl it doesn’t get on the floor. Also, they are messy eaters, so no more kibble on the floor either. I just shake the mats outside when they get messy. Love them!! Added note: Ants love to get in left-over cat food. I sprinkle cinnamon around the edge of the mat. No more ants, and no cinnamon spread!!
customer_reviews.author: Windchime

customer_reviews.title: Litter Getter
customer_reviews.text: I like the design of this mat and it's neutral color that fits well into my home. Over the past few weeks, it seems to have done an adequate job of trapping the litter although my cat is not too messy to begin with. So far the mat has easily cleaned with a vacuum hose and a cleaning wipes. At first, my cat thought that this was a new scratching mat and something that she should chew on. However, after a few days, she stopped and now doesn't pay any attention to the mat. It must be pretty durable because she has torn up her old mat and she didn't damage this one at all.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, lightweight and really works!
customer_reviews.text: I love this and just ordered the larger one too. This really traps the litter. The other day, one of my cats peed outside of the litter box onto this mat. No problem, I just picked up the mat, it traps pee too, and ran water over it, releasing both litter and pee, dried the back and even the front a bit, and replaced it. My floor stays clean and dry. Every litter box should come equipped with one of these mats!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jane Humes

customer_reviews.title: Picked it up to shake out the excess litter and found a HUGE DISGUSTING PUDDLE OF URINE trapped between the mat and the ...
customer_reviews.text: If all you want is litter control this is an okay mat. But stray urine seeps right through it. Picked it up to shake out the excess litter and found a HUGE DISGUSTING PUDDLE OF URINE trapped between the mat and the floor. Took me three days of bleaching to get the smell out. For half the price I could have gotten an outdoor welcome mat that actually has a water repelling barrier. It would have worked better. Not okay for pets who are all over the place with their spray or too old to aim well.
customer_reviews.author: JustJillian

customer_reviews.title: Love the size so my cats can't jump or side ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the size so my cats can't jump or side step over the mat - little brats! The material is also very nice, it really does a great job of catching and trapping the excess litter. It doesn't seem to retain a foul smell or anything. I have only one thing I wish was better with this mat, I wish it was easier to dump/clean. Living in Nebraska going outside to shake this out isn't always an option and doing it over a trash can isn't as easy as I'd like it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Martin

customer_reviews.title: Best mat ever! So good I bought two more!!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous mat. So great that I immediately bought two more! Now every litter box has this mat with it. It holds all the litter that it tracked out of the box. And the mesh doesn't bother the cats at all. I've had other mats that hold in the litter, but has been too stuff and harsh on the cats paws, so they would avoid the litter box and that never ends well! But this is great. And the mesh makes sure that everything stays dry and clean. I've had cats my whole adult life, and in over 29 years, this is the best mat I've ever used!
customer_reviews.author: Meggie

customer_reviews.title: Does a Good Job
customer_reviews.text: This does a decent-to-good job of catching litter as the cats exit their boxes (or fling bits outside as they are digging to China), but it isn't the easiest to clean. I use "The World's Best Cat Litter" (it really is) and it does get stuck in the mat a little more than I would like. However, better the mat than the floor, right?
customer_reviews.author: LBBPTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Nice and large, works great!
customer_reviews.text: I’m fostering four baby kittens and their Mama, and this is a godsend, especially for the size!. I’m going to order another one just to have on hand. It traps a lot of litter, which I just shake right back into the litter box. These little munchkins are learning, and sometimes mess around the box, so I shake the heck out of it, put it in the washer with other items needed to be washed, added some laundry soap and bleach and then when finished, put it out back over a lawn chair. Came out perfect!
customer_reviews.author: BVB

customer_reviews.title: Our cat likes to urinate on it.  :(
customer_reviews.text: It's a great idea and it does keep our cat's litter from tracking about the house. Unfortunately, one of our cats is attracted to it's odor and had urinated on it repeatedly. Washing (washing machine on cold and warm) and spraying down with OdorBan each time did not help. As much as I would like to like this product, it does not work with our cats. I've ready about cats being attracted (to urinate) on some rubberized mats where the material contains a substance with an ammonia like smell. The mat does not have any strong odor to me, but their sense of smell is certainly better than mine. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: The T Guy

customer_reviews.title: Strategic Usage
customer_reviews.text: Read the Usage pamphlet that accompanies the Non-Toxic Mat, it is insightful. I never would have thought about turning the box to the wall. The product itself is awesome. We've been using cheaper mats that don't work and the cost is comparable to our Jumbo Pawkin. We have rescued many strays and have several cats, so this product makes their care much easier on me by reducing litter on floor cleanup time greatly. Thank you Pawkin - I give it 5 Paws
customer_reviews.author: Fair and Honest

customer_reviews.title: HOW does she get litter all over the house without thumbs?
customer_reviews.text: I'm always amazed by our cat, specifically by how wide an area she manages to track litter. This came up as a "you might like THIS" item, so I impulse-bought it. Generally, my wife hates "impulse buys," but that rarely deters me. This one though, she had to (begrudgingly) admit was a good one. It's pretty large, and covers a good area in front of the litter box. Once we got the cat to quit trying to jump over it as she left the box, we've found that it definitely has helped to cut down the amount of litter nerds that we find all over the house. It's a very well-made, high-quality product, and one that I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Matt J.

customer_reviews.title: Cat tore it apart in 2 days
customer_reviews.text: I adopted a cat two weeks ago and put this out in front of the litter box. The very next day, I went into the room and pieces of the mat were laying around the room. I was stunned. Several pieces of the mat have been now tore off and I find them around the room. Not sure what the cat is doing to this litter mat, but it definitely is not holding up very well and has a chunk ripped off it. Sorry to report but if you have an energetic cat, this mat might not hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Book Collector

customer_reviews.title: Great mat, nice and large, soft on the paws!
customer_reviews.text: My second one, as the first started ripping and tearing. That's because I keep this outside, and it is subject to heavy weathering. The last one lasted me 3 years, I expect this to last another three years. The most important question is, is it SOFT? Will my cats actually WALK on this? And yes. To both. It's an effective litter mat, and the cats will walk on it. And occasionally nap on it. It is a PITB to clean, though. I shake it out, then when it gets really bad, I powerwash the litter out of it. I have to do that every couple of months; usually a good shake gets most of the litter out.
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: Cat says,  "What is this?"
customer_reviews.text: I love the mats. I use 106 quart plastic storage bins for litter. The mats fit in front of the litter pans just fine. One thing to note. Cats, being creatures of habit may not take to the different feel under their paws. I have 6 cats. Most padded right across the mats with no drama. One girl was leery of it and I had to put down a strip of rug to build her a bridge. She is okay with the mat now. Haven't had to clean it yet, but it looks like it will clean well.
customer_reviews.author: Chellma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my kitties!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I bought this cat mat. It has trapped the litter and very easy to vacuum for clean up. I use the vacuum’s hand hose to clean the mat. I bought the bigger mat and it does the trick for multiple cats. Lays nice. I am glad the company had gave a great how to use it and backs up product if required. I felt confident buying it and have had no reason to contact company as it is perfect for my kitties. I like they also support animal groups with a portion their profits.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Was expecting it to be bigger, but it still works for my needs
customer_reviews.text: The picture makes it look like two litter boxes can fit together over one end of the mat. Maybe they are just small boxes and the one I have is large, but I don't think I could fit a second litter box over the end like in the picture. But I was able to place the mat in a way that it was still the only place he walked when getting out of the litter box, and it's still big enough to contain any mess that comes off his feet or out of the box. Helps keep litter out of carpet, and helps keep him from tracking it to other places like the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Thackary

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is an all around great quality product. It is exactly as described. Easy to vacuum litter off of it. It pulls the litter off the cat's paws so that the litter doesn't get tracked across the floor. My cat did not like other mats and they didn't really get enough litter off his paws, so I tried this one. He liked the cushion in this mat and the texture of the surface. He sits on this mat and brings his toys over to it, even though the litter box is on it. I would have gotten a second one for his food dish, but it was larger than necessary for that use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I don't like is that while the grooved pattern works great to ...
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. My cat is a SLOB- gets pee all over the inside of the covered litter box and onto the floor. This catches some of the litter to make sweeping around the litter box a little easier. The only thing I don't like is that while the grooved pattern works great to catch litter, it traps urine in there also which you can't always easily wipe out if it has dried in there so sometimes I have to spray it down with the hose to give it a thorough cleaning. Overall I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni B.

customer_reviews.title: Stuck to Concrete Floor
customer_reviews.text: FYI buyers! While this litter mat worked really well to trap the litter, it stuck firmly to my concrete floor! When I tried to pull it up, it ripped completely and I had to scrap the remaining mat off. I was not expecting it to stick! Maybe put something else under the mat to prevent sticking! A mat for under the mat...
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Easy-Clean, & Cat Loves It
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves scratching this thing. And it's durable. Hasn't started to fray one bit. Holds litter really well. Love the material for easy clean-wipe down or vacuum. I just wish it came in like room size so I could just cover the whole floor in it. I love the way it feels under foot too (I know this is a gross concept but this really would be a cool flooring in general.). Worth the price. I'll be buying at least 2 more. Best invention ever (this is my first cat and the apartment has carpet and this mat is a life saver in my opinion-both from the cats nails and her litter). Do it. Buy it. Do it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not meant for a special needs kitty
customer_reviews.text: I have a special needs kitty who has issues with the litter box sometimes bc he loses his balance. Every once in a while he will accidentally poop right outside of the box, and this mat is not easy to clean. The poop gets smeared in the little nooks and crannies. I found myself having to clean it with the shower head far too often..Not a good fit for me, as I was looking for something much more convenient cleaning wise. Also after attempting to clean it, little black pebbles started to come out of it, almost like what they use on turf fields. I ended up throwing it away.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Smells like exhaust?
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 5 stars cause I greatly believe this mat will do the trick for my 2yr old cat who loves to shake her paws out of the litter box. I have a dome litter box cause she was flinging litter everywhere. Now she just tracks it down the ramp of the dome on to the bathroom floor. I was hoping I would contain the litter but nope. When the mat came I could smell it through the box. I thought the Amazon driver has an exhaust leak and it stunk up the boxes. Nope it was the mat, I don't mind as much cause I'm a mechanic. Just hope it won't bother my 🐈
customer_reviews.author: evan

customer_reviews.title: My cat needs two, but one is likely enough for most!
customer_reviews.text: This works so well! I use scoop free crystal litter and was finding it in my bed all the way on the other side of my carpeted apartment from the litter box. I bought two of these to create a longer runway (because my cat loves to jump out of the litter box and stepping on it once wasn't enough) and haven't seen any other than on the mats! They shake out back into the litter box and wipe down easily too! Very durable!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and works!
customer_reviews.text: I pair this with a very fine clumping litter, and it both traps a large amount of litter and is very easy to vacuum clean. The mat also holds up to being run through the washing machine on sterilization cycle with no issues. (I hang it to dry following the advice of other users.) Best of all, the texture doesn't bother my cat, so she has no issues walking across it after using her litter box.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Mat works fine. What impressed me the most was that my ...
customer_reviews.text: Mat works fine. What impressed me the most was that my cat (has Urinary Tract Syndrome with occasional unsatisfactory peeing behavior) peed on the mat. The result was an encrusted area where the litter bound with the urine. I put the mat outside to benefit from the downpours we have had and the heavy rain removed all of the residue. Then I used and odor remover product on the area and it is back in use. A hose would accomplish the same thing.This box is upstairs. I am ordering more for my basement boxes (3 cats in all) to diminish tracking.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Catches most litter
customer_reviews.text: I love this little mat. We have had this mat for over a year. It's the perfect size for our litter box and it does a great job of catching the majority of the litter keeping my cats from tracking it everywhere. I have three cats, and they all use all of the litter boxes, sometimes right after each other, and this catches all the litter. What little litter is left on their paws usually ends up right around the mat. This thing is a life safer. I dont have to wear slippers all the time in fear of stepping in stray cat litter and my house is so much cleaner now. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Joaquin Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: SO Worth It!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought additional mat-these really help reduce tracked litter. Work great & cats don’t mind walking on them. We have found vacuuming these mats works perfectly & weekly schedule is sufficient. I also bought this great metal scooper:  The metal scooper, together with these mats makes feline litter duty soo much easier! Wish I had bought them years ago...Great purchases!
customer_reviews.author: Kimbeeshopper

customer_reviews.title: Pictures Are Deceiving
customer_reviews.text: If I had one cat, with a very small litter box, these mats would have been fine. It is my bad, once again, I should have paid more attention to the dimensions and not so much to the picture. If you go by the picture, the mat appears to be very long, however, once I took it out of the packaging, the litter mat resembled more of a postage stamp. I will find some use for the mats, but not what they are intended for. This was a case of buyer beware, but on the other hand, kudos to the seller and photography capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: Pattik

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great size!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE the size of this mat!! Since I got it, the litter tracking issue has all but disappeared, and my cats seem to have no second thoughts at all about walking on it to and from their box. Please note that while I rated the 'easy to clean' and 'durability' features with 5 stars, I felt confused about rating this as 'water resistant'. I'm not sure what the vendor might be looking for, but it does get stray pee on it along with errant bits of litter - not much - and I can wash it off.
customer_reviews.author: Fran M.

customer_reviews.title: No more turd pellets
customer_reviews.text: We keep our cat box in the laundry room and my cat is the worst at tracking litter FAR out of the area. It was gross to be barefoot even within 10 feet of the room. I've had this mat under the box for maybe 2 weeks now and there is no stray litter finding it's way out of that mat. I did as the instructions suggested and put the mat all the way against a wall with the box entrance facing the wall. This means my cat has to step all over the mat to get in/out and all the litter gets trapped. This this is amazing. No more litter turd pellets around my house.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian E.

customer_reviews.title: No More Litter Trail
customer_reviews.text: Before my mat arrived, I got a detailed email from Pawkin explaining the best way to use and care for the mat. I loved this extra effort on their part. I learned that turning my litter box to face the wall would be a good thing because it would not only decrease the area for litter to fly but also would increase my cats' sense of privacy. While my bathroom configuration doesn't allow for this, the mat has been extremely successful and the litter is well contained. I don't expect this mat to wear out any time soon, although when that day comes I'll be going right back to Pawkin!
customer_reviews.author: Susan R. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, does the job, and it does it well!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It does the job very well. I even vacuum it with my cordless stick vacuum, and it lifts the litter right up from the mat.
customer_reviews.author: ohreally

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: This litter mat is great but I would recommend getting a larger one if you have a automatic literbox. Sometimes even though there is a lot of space on the rug the litter can end up on the outside of the rug. This litter mat is exactly as discribed. I've had it for about a week now & before when I had a normal carpet rug the day after cleaning the floor up there would be litter all over it. Since I got this i have only had to clean up the floor once. It catches the litter and goes down to where you can't even see the litter that has dropped onto the mat!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: It just works !!!
customer_reviews.text: It just works! Like many reviewers before me, I have found this mat to be terrific at catching litter before it is all over the house ... IF FACT, we will buy another to pick up the remaining litter just before the cat exits the room with the litter box ... expect very little litter left.
customer_reviews.author: Montanan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Ended up tossing both mats that we purchased. They worked well for the first few months, but while I thought I was getting them clean spraying down with a hose, the smell never went away. I even scrubbed them down and left them to soak, and even after all of that, litter was still coming out. Apparently it wasn't as easy to clean as I thought. And the smell never. went. away. And wet litter and even sometimes poo would get stuck in the mesh, and that was obviously not as easy to clean as just spraying it down. Ended up being more work than help.
customer_reviews.author: Heather B

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!! bought one, then bought two more !!! I own multiple cats and have a problem keeping litter in "their areas" this product Keeps the litter in the rug not everywhere else, the XXL/ Super size was the way to go.. fits one or two litter boxes or large litter boxes .. this product really worked for us!!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Leysen

customer_reviews.title: Great as a scratching pad
customer_reviews.text: Cut down the litter on my hardwood floor by about 60%. MUST vacuum. Obviously not able to sweep and impossible to shake out over the litter box. The texture entices scratching. Within a couple months, there was a 3” (and growing) hole in the middle of it. Waste of time and money. Tossed in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Susanna

customer_reviews.title: BEST EVER LITTER CATCHER!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this mat for the very first time and I am quite impressed! I have four cats and two litter boxes side by side in my bathroom. Typically after my cats use their litter boxes they leave a trail of litter outside of the boxes and into my hallway. After the first use, I saw a HUGE improvement!! I put the mat half under the boxes and half out on the floor. I would say at least 80-90 percent of the litter was immediately trapped in the mat as soon as they stepped out. I am so happy not to have it all over my hallways anymore! I Highly Recommend this mat to anyone with cats:)
customer_reviews.author: tess

customer_reviews.title: meh. Doesnt catch much.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing unique about this cat mat. A regular old rug (or piece of carpet) would probably do better if not the same. The fibers on the mat are too flat so doesn't catch much. It is important for fibers to be full and lush to get the litter off the cat otherwise you'll just have to train the cat to wipe his/her feet on the mat vigorously before walking off this mat. I am working on training my cat since this mat is not that good. Will post an update if/when the cat is trained. On second thought, I might just buy a better mat.
customer_reviews.author: Irfan Taj

customer_reviews.title: We have three litterboxes in our laundry room and these mats are large enough to provide good coverage for each of them
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three of these mats for our new house. We have three litterboxes in our laundry room and these mats are large enough to provide good coverage for each of them. However, we still have constant tracking of litter throughout the house. It's possible that it's the litter we're using (the silica crystals kind), but I was really hoping for better control of the tracking with these. Since buying three of these was costly, I may try to switch up the litter and see if that helps. If not, then I'll be looking for new mats.
customer_reviews.author: Scooterino

customer_reviews.title: Best Litter Mat to Prevent Tracking
customer_reviews.text: I do like this mat, it is large enough to fit around the litter box box (I put it in a cardboard box as well) and still give the cats some "wiping space" so they don't track everywhere. I didn't give it five stars as it is really hard to clean. The same material that makes the litter cling and not leave the area also traps the litter and makes it hard to vacuum up. I would recommend purchasing this as it is the best thing I have found to date. I have taken it outside and shaken it strongly and been somewhat successful at getting the litter out of the "pockets."
customer_reviews.author: FourBoysMom

customer_reviews.title: Finally -- a mat that works!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice mat and does exactly what I needed a mat to do. I was having to deal with little pieces of litter that escaped my previous mat, and had to clean the floor several times daily. I received an email before getting the mat explaining efficient ways to use it, and it is doing exactly what they said it would do. When I unpacked it, I put it outside in the sun, and the folds went away, and it is perfectly flat in the room with the litter box. This is an excellent product and well worth the money. Thank you for making such a great mat... God bless
customer_reviews.author: Keyman

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Good Size!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat! I have had a few different cat litter mats in the past and they would tear or get a weird smell after a while but I have had this one for almost a year and its held up amazingly. It does a good job at catching litter, I wouldnt say its the BEST but I think its just my cats being crazy and digging to china most the time. other than that, it catches 90% of litter and it hasnt gotten any weird smells or torn! win in my book!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis sage

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Litter Mat!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased numerous mats in the past, but most didn't stop the tracking like they claimed. This mat is large enough for both my cats litterboxes and appears easy to clean. My issue and it's not with the mat is I have an older cat who will kick out tons of litter and at times poop. This is litterbox related and I'm still working on finding the right box for him as he ages. This mat doesn't retain smells and seems like it doesn't hurt paws when they step onto it. I would definitely purchase again from this company!
customer_reviews.author: Butterflimom

customer_reviews.title: Works far better than the usual plastic 'entrance mat' for controlling litter.
customer_reviews.text: My partner got an XL litter mat for our downstairs litter box as a trial in trying to control the spread of litter. It was quite successful, and so we ordered two more! I like that there are multiple available 'neutral' colors, as the upstairs box is on a rustic brick-and-brown tile, whereas grey is best for the downstairs. Do be sure to get the mat which will be large enough to create a 'landing and travel zone' around your box.
customer_reviews.author: Viking gal

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad mat, it certainly does the job
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad mat, it certainly does the job. Large, it covers plenty of area but I have found it difficult to clean properly. Vacuuming will remove surface litter, but once it gets down inside, you need to pull it up and beat the heck out of it to get everything else out. I also question if my cats both do not like how it feels on their paws since both have a habit to hop over it when they can. One will go as far as reaching outside of the box and over the mat to wipe the littler off his feet. ... makes me wonder.. Not a bad product though.
customer_reviews.author: R.H.

customer_reviews.title: No help for our floor!
customer_reviews.text: Four cats... four litter boxes. For us, this did not work any better than a square of carpet or an entry mat! Our floors are wood and we placed the mat about 4 inches under the litter box to keep it anchored and to provide full coverage from the box access point. The struggle is real!
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: We got this to put under the litterbox to catch litter and it definitely gets the job done. It could be a tad bigger, but overall I don't have any serious complaints. It doesnt catch all the litter, but it definitely gets most of it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Justine

customer_reviews.title: Can't get over how litter-free the floor is.
customer_reviews.text: I used to step around the litter going to the bathroom all the time, before I go out and clean the floor again. It's the most frustrated thing. I think this mat combined with the tall cat litter bin we bought kept the cats (I have three gregarious male kittens) from spreading litter all over the place. The cats seem to love it, too, since they like laying on top of it. I think I should have bought a bigger one, though. I didn't think our new litter boxes would be also big when we got so used to kitten-sized boxes. Recommendation: one mat = one tall litter box.
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice Margarita V. Lapa

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this mat
customer_reviews.text: Have been using the mat for a few days now and it definitely cuts down on the amount of litter that ends up on the floor. Cats were a bit unsure of it at first, but I think that is because initially it had a very plastic kind of smell that dissipated in less than a day. It's super easy to vacuum using the brush attachment, cleans up great. I would recommend this, we use the clumping litter. Very happy with this purchase and also with the contact from the owner with advice on how to use and clean the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Small mat for kicker cat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my cat tends to kick litter all over the place. It is MUCH smaller than I thought it would be so she still manages to make a mess around the mat, but what lands on the mat gets trapped very well and it has definitely reduced the amount of litter she tracks through the apartment and the number of times she climbs into my bed with litter covered paws. I may need to buy a second one so I can actually cover the area near the litter box (maybe even 2 more), but it works well, just too small.
customer_reviews.author: Punk&Bi

customer_reviews.title: It Really Works
customer_reviews.text: I bought two mats, one for our upstairs litter box and one for the downstairs. Our boxes are not hooded, so I just placed each box in the corner of the room leaving most of the mat in front of the box, as directions suggest. Hooray! I didn't have to vacuum the stairs from litter this week, and I had to vacuum only a small amount near the downstairs one. Oh how I wish I had known about these mats years ago. They really eliminate a lot of litter tracking through the house. Gonna tell all my cat 🐱 parents about this too!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: Before I got this mat I was using an outdoor mat from Walmart that cost like $3 & after using this mat for about a month I’m a little disappointed. It never flattened out all the way so it still has creases from how it was shipped. It doesn’t seem to catch much litter & my cat’s nails get caught in the mesh when she walks on it. The mesh part just doesn’t seem effective. Probably should’ve kept the cheap outdoor mat as a backup but this mat will do for now.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Brooks

customer_reviews.title: This mat is working for me
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if this mat would help me with the litter tracked from the cat's litter boxes but it does greatly help. I have two litter boxes side by side in a very small bathroom and I was tired of sweeping the floor several times a day. I have two Siamese cats (12 lbs and 15 lbs). I feed them twice a day and there is a lot of litter box activity. One box is filled with The World's Greatest litter and the other is filled with Precious Cat litter. Both work fine. The litter is trapping well in the mat and very little is needed to be swept.
customer_reviews.author: Meh

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely works.
customer_reviews.text: Seriously....this thing is awesome. I have two 4 month old kittens and it absolutely keeps the litter trapped. I have an enclosed box so they only jump out the one side so I put it lengthwise just outside the door and there's NO litter on the floor outside of the mat. My previous mat with only one cat at the time never kept the litter from scattering. This thing with 2 cats is better than that one was. I love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Mermaidstylist

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 cats and four litter boxes that are not covered..I ordered 2 litter mats and had reduced my litter boxes to 3 to accommodate the mats in my laundry room. Before the purchase of mats I was vacuuming my tiled floor every 2 days...now I look and see no tracks of litter on floor or from their journey from downstairs to upstairs on my steps.Thank You Pawkin ! I am Amazed because I thought it would only work with covered litter boxes
customer_reviews.author: jackiep

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 mats... one for my bunny and one for my cat. The mats I had been using my bunny kept peeing on and chewing! Thankfully, Bum-Bum & Snickers both seem to be happy with this new mats. Bum-Bum has stopped peeing on the mat and as for Snickers and her kicking litter all over, this mat does seem to keep the litter contained when she jumps in and out of her box (I have not vacuumed for 4 days!). The mats are very easy to clean and vacuum litter up easily. The mat is also very durable and is a visually eye appealing color. I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ThisOldTub

customer_reviews.title: it does not really do great at removing litter from kitty paws when they walk ...
customer_reviews.text: While this mat holds the litter fairly ok, it does not really do great at removing litter from kitty paws when they walk on it, it more just catches excess litter that is flung during digging and burying. We are still sweeping litter from the floors at least 3x's a week down from 4 or 5 and have recently found that it's best if we shake the mat out, daily, somewhat defeating it's purpose of eliminating so much litter clean-up. We have 2 cats and 2 litter boxes. We bought the one mat to make sure it worked, we won't be buying a 2nd of the same brand.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Works Very Well!!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! We have had the mat in place for a couple weeks now and it has definitely helped deter litter from going everywhere. We use the Arm and Hammer Natural litter and the litter mat so far has kept it within the mat! I also like the size of the mat, our whole litter box fits on it and there is still room to spare which helps with cleanliness in general. Most litter mats I see only cover the space under front of the box so this was a factor in deciding to purchase esp with the great Prime Day deal we got! Great Purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: KatieLady

customer_reviews.title: They're done an amazing job of grabbing the litter and keeping it from ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought several of these to fill an area of the basement where I keep the litter boxes. They're done an amazing job of grabbing the litter and keeping it from scattering throughout the basement. Also easy to clean using a broom and dustpan. Would definitely buy again. Edited to add that I have a few dogs that like to dig in the litter boxes for "treats" (ugh) despite my doing everything to keep them out. They're the biggest culprits in kicking the litter out of the boxes. Laying a few of the mats together to fill the larger area has helped keep the litter from scattering even further into the room.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Smith

customer_reviews.title: it is worse than the bathroom mat that I used to use
customer_reviews.text: The mat does absolutely nothing to stop my cats from tracking the cat litter all over the place. In fact, it is worse than the bathroom mat that I used to use.
customer_reviews.author: truthbetold

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I know some reviews state this mat is difficult to clean, well I take it outside and give it 1 or 2 gentle shakes and all litter is gone. It cleans nicely. I love the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a cat litter problem in the bathroom because even tho my litter box is closed the cat still manage to take some out. I have 2 toddlers, so cat litter on the floor is a no-no. So I decided to give this a try... GUESS what? IT REALLY WORKS!!! No more cat litter in the floor spreading all over the place. The cat goes inside, does her busimess and them whatever it comes out it is trapped by this carpet. I shake the carpet outside every couple of days and I dont have to sweep any cat litter, so I win!
customer_reviews.author: themonkeys

customer_reviews.title: really catches loose litter
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cat litter mat. The litter box is kept in the laundry room and I was getting tired of stepping on litter. My only complaint is that the mat is a little larger than I wanted. The smaller size was out of stock and I didn't want to wait to order the mat. This is not a bad problem. Also, the mat is soft and doesn't hurt when stepped on barefoot. Some of the litter mats I've used before hurt my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda LaRouche

customer_reviews.title: Finally don't have to sweep 10x/week
customer_reviews.text: For the past 14 years I've use a brush and pan daily to sweep up the litter my cat spills around the box. We have carpet, so you can imagine how tedious this can get. Never bothered to get a mat because most were too expensive or too small to cover the area it needed to (my cat is a real kicker). I bought this when it was a Daily Deal and am absolutely satisfied. It's a great size and the litter gets trapped into the weaving perfectly. Cleanup is easy; just roll it up, bring it outside, then give it a few flaps to get most of the litter out (I haven't tried the vacuum method). Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Wends

customer_reviews.title: Preferred choice of kitty box mats
customer_reviews.text: Used for the kitty litter box in the laundry room. Helps to keep box in place when placed partially on mat n’ keeps kitty litter from being tracked throughout the house after the cats are finished with their business. Durable.... I vacuum regularly and wash mats in machine every other week or so (drip dry.) I’ve purchased 4 of these mats since I started using them a few years ago. I have had cats for 20+ years, my oldest cat is 17 years. If you find a good quality product, stay with it.
customer_reviews.author: JordanLuvsPugs

customer_reviews.title: Does it job well
customer_reviews.text: Vacuuming works the best for cleaning this mat. I bought it to put inside litter box furniture to protect the wood and to help decrease tracking onto the really hard to get litter out of carpet in my apartment. It works great for that purpose and actually vacuum cleans better than any other anti litter tracking mat I own.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca Huber

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Catches probably 95% of the litter off our kitten. Big enough to make it hard for her to get out without stepping over it if you use it as recommended (making sure that the litter box is in a corner so the cat has to go across it) Shake it out about once a week to keep it working well. Some other people noted that it has a strong smell when it comes in, which is true, but it's also true that the smell dissipates very quickly (probably 2-4 hours in a well ventilated room) and isn't overly unpleasant. It pretty much smells like new car or warm rubber.
customer_reviews.author: S. Strader

customer_reviews.title: So far, less mess!!
customer_reviews.text: have only used the mat for a few days, but was very pleased with the info that came with it! I saved a male kitten a couple years ago, but since having him, I have cat litter in every room in the house! I have always had cats, but not this problem! Part of the info with the mat said to turn the opening of the box toward the wall- which I did, and the difference is wonderful!! And the mat does seem to trap the litter much better than a rug or the previous mat I had. If it continues to have so much less litter, I will be extremely happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A Keilholz

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Purrrrfect size
customer_reviews.text: Used this to go under the Tidy Cats Breeze System XL. Purrrrfect size. Just sweep up or shake off pellets. To clean, soak in tub
customer_reviews.author: Amazin Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best litter box mat ever.
customer_reviews.text: I now have 4 of these wonderful mats. I have used many different mat over the years for my multiple cat home but these are the best. They stop almost all of the litter from leaving the area (a few grains always escape) and save me from constantly cleaning the floor. I wouldn't buy any other brand for my four cats.
customer_reviews.author: john tuthill

customer_reviews.title: Read the e-mailbefore using
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike, it works perfectly, better than anything we've used before. I did follow the advice of a previous reviewer and read the email received before using it. This is good customer service, but perhaps this could be printed and included in the packaging? Being in use for less than a week, I couldn't give it five stars for durability as it's too early to make that judgment.
customer_reviews.author: NorfolkBoy

customer_reviews.title: Smells really terrible - unusable!
customer_reviews.text: The product would be perfect if it didn’t smell so terrible! It reeks like cigarette smoke. The smell is very strong even though I’ve been airing it out for days. I ordered this in April, but just opened it this week since my new kitty is coming home on June 27. The window for returns has passed, so I cannot return the items, and I cannot use the mats with my cat when the stink so badly! I wanted to love this product, and I would if not for the horrible, chemical, smoke-like smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grabs a hold and won't let go
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical at first. I mean cat litter gets every where. It actually did capture about 95% of the litter though. The instruction gives you lots of options to make it the most optimal at catching the litter. It also gives instructions on how to clean it out and it's hard. That litter sticks inside it like no other. I have to take it outside and beat it a little. So what litter it does catch, it keeps a hold of it great.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: can't use yet bad smell not from cat
customer_reviews.text: Had to put it outside as soon as I opened the plastic. The smell was so bad my eyes watered and I had a massive headache. It has been outside just over a day and I am hoping the smell goes away soon. It still stinks and when it got damp the smell got worse. If the smell does not fade in another couple of days I may return it.
customer_reviews.author: PETER

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for trapping litter and catching spills
customer_reviews.text: We are super pleased with this mat. It protects the floor from any spills from cat boxes and it traps the litter, therefore there is less litter on the floor and cleaning it is easy. We dust it off outside, spray it down with some soapy water, then throw it in the washing machine for a thorough cleaning and allow it to hang dry. It is durable, practical and worth every penny. We highly recommend it for an area used for cat litter boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Karangelen

customer_reviews.title: Read the Brochure!
customer_reviews.text: I read the brochure enclosed with the Litter Mat. This is a new thing for me. I rarely/never read those things. What I learned was that I needed to face the opening of the litter box more into a wall or a corner, instead of straight out into the room. It gives the cats privacy and they don’t get to throw the litter all over the floor. It has made all of the difference. LOVE this Litter Mat and the information provided with it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hill

customer_reviews.title: It stinks!
customer_reviews.text: When I opened this mat, the smell was unreal! It has such a strong odor of chemicals! I immediately washed it with soap and water in the bathtub. I even let it soak for a little bit, hoping that it would get rid of the smell. It barely even helped with the odor! I used a towel to try to dry the mat, but the underside just refuses to dry. I left it on a rack to dry, but even after hours, it's damp. I would not recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: RParker

customer_reviews.title: Not for poop slingers
customer_reviews.text: The mat itself works at trapping sand, however my cat likes to kick his turds like projectiles out of his litter box and flings sand everywhere in the process. For a normal non-poop slinging cat I think this may would work at trapping the sand, but if you have a crazy cat like mine once there is so much sand there is nothing left the mat can do. Overall I think it would work for a normal cat, as it does trap sand, just not all of it.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa karlin

customer_reviews.title: but this has worked great for us
customer_reviews.text: This mat is the smartest pet product for a feline! My cat "Puddin" is as persnickety as any. She will only use one brand of kitty litter! That was trial and error to figure that out. Maybe some of the others do not work as well, but this has worked great for us. Much cleaner area and have found no problems with clean-up. For a rescue, she has done great and had no problem adjusting to the new landing mat, once business was taken care of. I love the assistance to cleaner kitty! Go Pawkin. Great litter mat!
customer_reviews.author: Martha J.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I had bought 2 other kinds of litter mats which were a waste of money. When I saw a lightening deal on this one & read the reviews I thought Id give it a try. Thank goodness I did! It stays in place & traps litter better than I could have dreamed. I am so pleased I bought a second one for the other litter box. They have cut down the scattered litter around 95% better than the other mats. I needed to trim one to fit around a door jamb & the material was easy to cut for a snug fit. I cannot imagine a better one for sale. It even vacuums well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wells

customer_reviews.title: Terrible to clean
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping for something that would help with the mess from my cat who seems to like to kick litter all over the place. It helped for the most part, but this is terrible to clean! My cat had an accident where some of his litter/pee was not fully in the box and landed in the mat. I have tried to wash this rug with the hose, a carpet cleaner, etc and it still smelled so bad I had to throw it out, only after having it for a few months. Something about this mat really holds onto that terrible cat pee smell..
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job of catching the cat litter where the cat walks on it in the bathroom. I've had to play with the placement of it in relation to the litter box to maximize trapping the litter, but after some trial and error, I have figured out how to best make it work. It does not slide around either when the cat runs in to it at full speed. Most importantly, cleanup is a breeze: I just take the vacuum hose and run it over it; don't even need to even pick it up.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S.

customer_reviews.title: Best Cat Litter Mat I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered several of these cat litter mats after trying one out. They are the best cat litter mats I've ever used. They're durable (stand up to one of my cats pawing at it with no visible defects) and are a nice very large size. I use one mat turned sideways in front of two jumbo sized litter boxes and it is more than adequate to catch litter scatter from both litter boxes. It seems like less litter is being tracked away from the litter boxes too. Gave one as a gift to another cat-loving friend. They are very happy with it also.
customer_reviews.author: PNW gal

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a 5 except it hasn't really been long enough to tell me if it will be a 5. I was happy with its large size. It's a very good buy as compared with a tiny pet store type. The folds ironed out within a day just as they said. I am anxious to see how much litter is trapped. Good value and arrived in just a couple of days. I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: vanderso

customer_reviews.title: Too small to be called an XL, should be XS.
customer_reviews.text: The mat works fine but they shouldn't call this an XL! I have a mat that is 2.5 to 3x's the size of this (which works just as well and cost the same) and so when I saw the description was XL, I didn't bother to look at the dimensions. Bad call - this thing is tiny. Don't buy for a large litter box or for a multi-cat household.
customer_reviews.author: CStiniB

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This matt really stops cat litter from getting all over the place. This is my 5th Matt this one is the best by far. I think the larger the better
customer_reviews.author: Joy W.

customer_reviews.title: Litter box change may be more important than mat change
customer_reviews.text: Product is good enough, however getting the enclosed upper entry litter box resolved my issues with litter all over the floor, for the most part. It might have a smell in it that makes our dog and cat want to go #2 on it. They have never done this before, so who knows? A bit expensive honestly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: ok, I am pleased to say that I am very pleasantly surprised by this item. We have 2 litter boxes in our bathroom (no other place for them), and we placed the mat so our cats have to step on it before stepping on the tile floor. This mat easily traps the litter on their feet preventing it from being tracked all over the tile floor. Simply shake the mat out periodically and place it back down in front of the litter boxes. In case you have picky animals, it took our cats about 3 days to get used to being comfortable while stepping on the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Actually works!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased! I’ve tried several different cat mats, as well as standard bathroom mats, and still had painful litter crystals on the bathroom floor. The litter crystals fall through the material of this mat, and don’t get tracked around and under my bare feet. It is very simple to vacuum the crystals out about once a week. Glad I purchased it, and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great Solution To an Irksome Problem!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one of these mats. Litter clings to the kitty's feet and gets all over the basement floor. We could see that the first one does a great job but with the additional mat there is NO litter spreading out any more. We got rid of the killer rag rug. These mats are so neat, non-skid and effective. Vacuum clean with ease. Thanks for these.
customer_reviews.author: Mar Payton

customer_reviews.title: Good Information
customer_reviews.text: The mat works very well. The emailed information sent after I purchased it, really helped. I have two cats and they have accepted the changes suggested. I put a hood back on the litter box and faced it to a wall with enough room for the cats to enter. Then put the mat under the box and covering the entry area. After awhile, I may even try the very light litter again and see how that works. Previously, that was a disaster, with the cats flinging it all over and tracking it all over the house. Thanks for a well-designed mat and some good suggestions!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

product_meta.title: Pawkin Cat Litter Mat, Patented Design with Litter Lock Mesh, Durable, Easy to Clean, Soft, Fits Under Litter Box, Litter Free Floors
feature_bullets: TRAPS LITTER TO KEEP YOUR FLOORS CLEAN - Our effective Litter Lock mesh technology keeps litter off your floor.
REMARKABLY DURABLE MATERIAL - We’ve designed a cat litter box mat that’s made to last.
EASY TO VACUUM - Our heavyweight mats won’t be damaged by your vacuum. Or, you can also shake out or rinse off your mat. Keeps like new.
COMFORTABLE FOR YOUR CAT TO WALK ON - Cats love our soft yet substantial mats. Designed for sensitive paws.
100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE - No questions asked. We stand by the quality of our mats. Period.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
